text:
Hi everyone! Short time lurker, first time poster. I'm the new dev rel lead at HubSpot. You may have seen Mark, our awesome designer post in here recently.  Our team wants to learn more about your experiences building with HubSpot (and we want know it all)! The good, the bad, and your wishlists to make sure we’re building for your use cases and providing you with the best dev experience possible

If you’re interested in giving feedback - you can sign-up (using this super quick form). Thank you! Also, free free to drop me a DM if you're curious about anything DX at HubSpot.
<https://www.research.net/r/7985SL6>

Anyone having issues trying to embed the meetings forms on the CMS? Not sure if this is a development issue or support issue. Despite the new announcement, I get server errors in the console when I try to do this.
